entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
